name: Discer
overview: Discer is a science fiction platform game. On the way to the planet Xarrhox the space shuttle has been damaged. An exploring robot landed on an alien planet. His task is to find twelve floppy disks scattered around three continents. The player can use the plasma pistol with limited ammunition. Extra ammunition is added after finding each explosive. Found dynamite should be fired up in the right place to demolish the blocking walls. Contact with enemy means an immediate loss of life.
